title: QGIS Conference 2026 in LAAX
content:
The QGIS User Conference 2026 location is now official! We’re heading to Laax, Switzerland in the heart of the Swiss Alps, where QField was born.

Join us on 5–6 October 2026 at Crap Sogn Gion (2,222 m) for two days of talks, workshops, and community, surrounded by spectacular mountain scenery and outdoor adventures.

Double-click to visit the conference page
